report.title: A Novel Experience
report.author: doppleganger
report.bodytext: 9:00pm EST tapped out about 35 mg 4-aco-dalt and placed on tongue /n very bitter and persistant taste /n 9:30 in chat talking to someone and it really started to comeup /n I then laid down in bed to watch CSI Miami /n 10:00 having sex is great but I cant nut /n very playful and (p)silly at the time /n 10:30 deep respiration and some mild visuals if I concentrate on them /n I didnt look at a clock for a while so I was watching Aqua Teen Hunger Force /n everything was funnier than usual /n 1:00 started to come down some chest tightness similar to DMT /n 1:30 smoked some resin and the psilly feelings came back /n 3:00 finally baseline again /n /n I could have taken more and had a more intense experience I believe /n very similar to shrooms in the drunken walk /n and the joints feeling very odd movement is pleasant /n I was rubbing my feet together for a good while and also rubbing my head /n never got past a +2 but I would do it again /n next time I would smoke herb during the peak
